briefdescription.para: Immediately switch to a different input stream.

simplesect.para: This function does not reset the start condition to INITIAL .

briefdescription.para: Switch to a different input buffer.
Allocate and initialize an input buffer state.

parameterdescription.para: The character buffer size in bytes. When in doubt, use YY_BUF_SIZE.

detaileddescription.para:
On the next scan, YY_INPUT will be called.
b
the buffer state to be flushed, usually YY_CURRENT_BUFFER.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

briefdescription.para: Pushes the new state onto the stack.

detaileddescription.para:
The new state becomes the current state. This function will allocate the stack if necessary.
new_buffer
The new state.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

briefdescription.para: Removes and deletes the top of the stack, if present.

detaileddescription.para:
The next element becomes the new top.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

briefdescription.para: Setup the input buffer state to scan directly from a user-specified character buffer.

parameterdescription.para: the size in bytes of the character buffer

simplesect.para: the newly allocated buffer state object.

briefdescription.para: Setup the input buffer state to scan a string.

detaileddescription.para:
The next call to yylex() will scan from a copy of str.
yystr
a NUL-terminated string to scan
yyscanner
The scanner object.
the newly allocated buffer state object.
If you want to scan bytes that may contain NUL values, then use yy_scan_bytes() instead.

briefdescription.para: Setup the input buffer state to scan the given bytes.

detaileddescription.para:
The next call to yylex() will scan from a copy of bytes.
yybytes
the byte buffer to scan
_yybytes_len
the number of bytes in the buffer pointed to by bytes.
yyscanner
The scanner object.
the newly allocated buffer state object.

briefdescription.para: Get the user-defined data for this scanner.

detaileddescription.para:
This data is never touched by the scanner.
user_defined
The data to be associated with this scanner.
yyscanner
The scanner object.

This does not discard the current input buffer.
in_str
A readable stream.
yyscanner
The scanner object.
yy_switch_to_buffer

briefdescription.para: Get the length of the current token.
